SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CustomerEntity
Represents the persistent entity for a customer, mapped to the customers table in the database.
CustomerModel
Represents a domain model for a customer in the system.
CustomerRowMapper
Maps a row from the customers database table to a CustomerEntity object.
CustomersBusinessService
Service implementation for handling business logic related to customers.
CustomersBusinessServiceInterface
Interface defining business operations related to customers.
CustomersDataService
Service class for managing CustomerEntity data access.
CustomersRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on the customers table.
CustomerViewModel
View model representing a customer for presentation purposes.
DataAccessInterface<T>
Generic interface defining basic CRUD operations for data access.
GameEntity
Represents the persistent entity for a game, mapped to the games table in the database.
GameModel
Represents a domain model for a video game in the system.
GamesBusinessService
Service implementation for handling business logic related to games.
GamesBusinessServiceInterface
Interface defining business operations related to games.
GamesDataService
Service class for managing GameEntity data access.
GamesRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on the games table.
GamesRowMapper
Maps a row from the games database table to a GameEntity object.
GamingHubApplication
 
MainController
 
OrderEntity
Represents the persistent entity for an order, mapped to the orders table in the database.
OrderItemEntity
Represents an order item entity mapped to the order_items table in the database.
OrderItemModel
Represents a domain model for an item within an order.
OrderItemRowMapper
Maps a row from the order_items database table to an OrderItemEntity object.
OrderItemsBusinessService
Service implementation for handling business logic related to order items.
OrderItemsBusinessServiceInterface
Interface defining business operations related to order items.
OrderItemsDataAccessInterface
Data access interface for OrderItemEntity extending generic CRUD operations.
OrderItemsDataService
Service class for managing OrderItemEntity data access.
OrderItemsRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on the order_items table.
OrderItemViewModel
View model representing an order item in the presentation layer.
OrderModel
Represents a domain model for an order in the system.
OrdersBusinessService
Service implementation for handling business logic related to orders.
OrdersBusinessServiceInterface
Interface defining business operations related to orders.
OrdersDataService
Service class for managing OrderEntity data access.
OrdersRepository
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on the orders table.
OrdersRowMapper
Maps a row from the orders table in the database to an OrderEntity.
OrderViewModel
View model representing an order, combining domain data with associated customer and order item details for presentation purposes.
